title: Ticket #2246: condor_hdfs does not start up anymore
description: As of Condor 7.6.0, condor_hdfs does not start up anymore. This is related to the removal of the default java -Xmx arguments. The hdfs daemon was "trained" to default to strip the first argument in the java command line. This is however no longer "-Xmx" -- now it becomes "-cp", the stripping of which makes condor_hdfs fail.
remarks: The current patch fixes the issue as such, but for datanodes, the first command line argument is still stripped; ticket will remain active until I've found the reason for that.
check_ins:
